name: Linknami
tag_list: link-building, article-marketing, free-content, blog-marketing, link-exchange, one-way-links, backlinks, internet-marketing, web-traffic
overview:
Linknami is a set of free link building tools which allow website owners and webmasters to setup targeted one way links to their websites and blogs.

Using the built-in article marketing, link building and link exchange tools, users can find, request and ultimately get a wide variety of targeted links from other websites, inner pages and blogs in the form of regular links, content snippets, contextual links and links in articles and blog posts to their website, blog and inner pages.

In contrast to other article marketing and link exchange systems users links and content snippets can appear anywhere on the page, from top to bottom, within existing content, making them completely natural! Linknami automatically verifies the existence of articles, links and content snippets on a daily basis, making content and contextual links truly permanent!
